input.sentences: the bride and groom exchange vows .
they have a very vintage car to ride in .
the bride and groom smile for pictures .
output.sentences: The bride and groom exchange wedding vows.
At the end of the ceremony they ride away in a vintage car.
The groom flashes a big smile for the wedding pictures.
The family enjoys gathering at the reception venue.
This young boy takes pictures of the family having fun.
